channel.title: riscv on Meow
channel.description: Recent content in riscv on Meow

item.title: Risc-V Learning Summary
item.description: Enjoying and Hating assembly. Recently, I self-learned the cs61c(su20) class, which requires you to write a risc-v program to make a simple neural network in the project 2. It could be annoying that you write some bug in the assembly since the debug condition is frustrating. After all, through the project I learned a lot about risc-v, especially the calling conventions(at the beginning I haven't paid much attention to it, and it had really caused a lot of problems to my work).
